item.title: Holi: A library of colors, gradients and utils for Jetpack Compose
item.description: bookmark_border Featured in AndroidWeekly.net Issue #460 code Open-sourced on Google Developers Library A library of colors, gradients and utils built using Jetpack Compose for Android Features A wide collection of colors from different palettes for easy access in your pet projects Provides easy gradient building functions that all your composable brushes need Just 28 KB in size!
